page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content: In Strathaven Academy there are 28 clubs including Art,choir,drama, hockey,badminton,rugby,computing, football,scripture union, athletics skiing,cricket,chess etc.There is also a staff "football?"club which plays tournaments with similar clubs and a team from the local prison. In Strathaven there are two bowling clubs,an 18 hole golf course,football teams covering eight age groups and an amateur team called Glenavon F.C. A large number of sports clubs use the Sports Centre(see Sports Centre entry) The Round Table is an organisation which organises many events which benefit charity e.g. Gala Day, the Raft Race etc.There a Strathaven Choral Society and an amateur dramatics society called Strathaven Players.There are of course Guides, Scouts,Army Cadets etc.in the town.
